EmailTemplate.name: Application Documents Rejected
EmailTemplate.subject: Documents Rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Application__c.Account__c},
One or more document submitted with {!Application__c.Name} have been rejected. Please login at {!Site.UrlPathPrefix} to review the reasons for the rejection and resubmit the necessary documents. You application cannot be considered further until this issue is resolved.
Feel free to contact us at the number provided herein with any questions are concerns regarding the above information.
Regards,
Arizona Supreme Court (602) 555-5555
